bibl.title: Heidelberg Documentary Papyri Project.
bibl.note: Presents a project started in 1989, the aim of which is to provide a comprehensive computer data-base of all published papyri. Two aspects are of central importance: these are the dating of each papyrus and whether there is a published photograph of it. As far as the Greek text is concerned, the information has been kept to a minimum (original title, brief summary).

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists

bibl.seg: COWEY James M.S., Heidelberg Documentary Papyri Project.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 609-612.

Presents a project started in 1989, the aim of which is to provide a comprehensive computer data-base of all published papyri. Two aspects are of central importance: these are the dating of each papyrus and whether there is a published photograph of it. As far as the Greek text is concerned, the information has been kept to a minimum (original title, brief summary).
